oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Efficacy of Ceftiofur Hydrochloride Administered Parenterally for Five Consecutive Days for Treatment of Acute Post-partum Metritis in Dairy Cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chenault, John R.
McAllister, Joseph F.
Chester, S. Theodore
Dame, Kenneth J.
Kausche, Fabian M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ceftiofur hydrochloride
ceftiofur
metritis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to evaluate under clinical, field conditions the efficacy of ceftiofur hydrochloride [HCl] as EXCENELÂ® RTU Sterile Suspension administered parenterally at doses of 1.1 or 2.2 mg ceftiofur equivalents (CE)/kg body weight (BW; 0.5 or 1.0 mg CE/lb BW) for five days for the treatment of acute post-partum metritis in dairy cows.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2001; 137-138
